## Welcome!
Thank you for visiting my website. Here you will find more information about my current research, including ongoing projects, links to to OSF projects and pre-registrations, and my CV.

### Brief Bio
I am a clinical psychologist by training, specializing in behavioral medicine research and evidence-based interventions for pain and rehabilitation. 

Github: <https://github.com/marcusgwild?tab=repositories>.  
OSF: <https://osf.io/ufp93/>.
